name: I Am A Square
description:
This is my submission for Ludum Dare #45. The theme is "Start with nothing". 

I recommend running the game natively or through Firefox as Chrome-related browsers seem to be running into an error. It's likely the way I exported off Godot.

To say that you started with nothing suggests accumulation, that you'll end with more than nothing. Going off this, I made a simple puzzle game inspired by Katamari Damacy and a japanese puzzle platformer involving jellies with cute faces that I can't remember. 

Move around with arrow keys. When you touch a block, they attach to you. To complete each level, you must cover all the goal tiles either with yourself or blocks attached to you.
